publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3153.1 John Scott: GM Field Trials-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3153) in the name of Fiona McLeod, leave out from "and that" to end and insert "and to maintain this reputation considers that it is now necessary that a complete review of all available scientific evidence is undertaken to confirm the safety of the continuation of these trials in order to reassure the public on environmental and health grounds and further to make a concerned public aware of the importance of genetic modification with regard to nourishing and feeding an ever-expanding world population."
